t: 1 Chronicles 8
The Genealogy of Saul the Benjamite
Benjamin*ln was the father of Bela his firstborn, Ashbel*ld the second son, Aharah the third,
Nohah*ld the fourth and Rapha the fifth.
The*ln sons of Bela were: Addar,*ld Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan and Huram.
These*ln were the descendants of Ehud, who were heads of families of those living in Geba and were deported to Manahath:
Naaman,*ld Ahijah, and Gera, who deported them and who was the father of Uzza and Ahihud.
Sons*ln were born to Shaharaim in Moab after he had divorced his wives Hushim and Baara.
By his wife Hodesh he had Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
Jeuz, Sakia and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of families.
By Hushim he had Abitub and Elpaal.
The*ln sons of Elpaal: Eber,*ld Misham, Shemed (who built Ono and Lod with its surrounding villages),
and Beriah and Shema, who were heads of families of those living in Aijalon and who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.
Ahio,*ln Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ishpah and Joha were the sons of Beriah.
Zebadiah,*ln Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.
Jakim,*ln Zikri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.
Ishpan,*ln Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Iphdeiah and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.
Shamsherai,*ln Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah and Zikri were the sons of Jeroham.
All*p these were heads of families, chiefs as listed in their genealogy, and they lived in Jerusalem.
Jeiel*pln the father of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. His*ld wife’s name was Maakah,
and his firstborn son was Abdon, followed by Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zeker
and Mikloth, who was the father of Shimeah. They too lived near their relatives in Jerusalem.
Ner*ln was the father of Kish, Kish the father of Saul, and Saul the father of Jonathan, Malki-Shua, Abinadab and Esh-Baal.
The*ln son of Jonathan: Merib-Baal,*ld who was the father of Micah.
The*ln sons of Micah: Pithon,*ld Melek, Tarea and Ahaz.
Ahaz*ld was the father of Jehoaddah, Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth and Zimri, and Zimri was the father of Moza.
Moza was the father of Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son and Azel his son.
Azel*ln had six sons, and these were their names: Azrikam,*ld Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
The*ln sons of his brother Eshek: Ulam*ld his firstborn, Jeush the second son and Eliphelet the third.
The sons of Ulam were brave warriors who could handle the bow. They had many sons and grandsons—150 in all. All*ln these were the descendants of Benjamin.
